Articles.Content:
Hi all,

First of very all, I hugely thank the KSP community of modders, for all their hard work to try achieve some "Glorious little pieces of work" (as always mentioned by Kottabo).

Despite the fact I'm diving here from a long time now, I've never posted anything.

Reason is simple, too many posts to ask questions, about things already asked by others (but somewhere else).

Luckily, I've always found what I wanted.

Thanks @Gaarst and the others for your time and effort

Btw, I'm french, and could give a hand for any french related content is required

Ta!

Thanks for the appreciation, it's always welcome! However, I feel like you should be thanking modders more than me: I'm just copy-pasting links, they are the ones who make your game better. Don't hesitate to ask questions, even if they might have already been asked, worst case scenario someone scolds you for not using the forums' terrible search function and links an older relevant thread.

If you want to help with things in French, go take a look at the French section of the forums (it's pretty empty right now because it's new) or propose your help for translating mods in the thread below.

Spoiler

Merci du compliment, ça fait toujours plaisir ! Par contre à mon avis tu devrais remercier les moddeurs plutôt que moi: je fais que copier-coller des liens, ce sont eux qui améliorent ton jeu. N'hésite pas à poser des questions même si elles ont pu déjà être posées, au pire quelqu'un râle parce que tu n'as pas utilisé la fonction recherche des forums et lie une discussion existante sur le sujet.

Si tu veux aider avec le français, jette un œil du côté de la section française du forum (même si c'est un peu mort là tout de suite) ou propose ton aide pour traduire des mods existants dans la discussion que j'ai liée plus haut.

Pleasure @Gaarst

I'm starting to think that I'll issue a thread sitcked on yours, but with explanations in French, if you indeed authorise this

Thanks for the DMagic link btw !
